pr_title: Issue #1404: Implemented tests for Metadata package acl layer

timeline.bodyText:
I wonder how it ended up there :)
It is a good practice to review your pull request changes right before submitting it on GitHub. You can do this either in your IDE or in GitHub GUI during pull request creation.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Looks like we can use mockLoadEntity here as well.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText:
I suppose that these two test scenarios can be called shouldUpdateMetadataItemKeyForOwner and shouldDenyUpdateMetadataItemKeyForNonOwner. It clarifies what kind of permissions are tested.
Could you please also check other test methods for the same issue in the test class below.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: I'm wondering if we can remove existing mockAuthUser method and rename mockAuthentication to mockAuthUser. I don't think that there is a need to have both methods.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: What do you think about moving mockAuthentication call to the test class setup method? User name can be retrieved from the security context. It will also require to change some of the method @WithMockUser annotations.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: It would be nice to extract FireCloudClass.PARTICIPANT to the class field.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Let's add test for MetadataEntityApiService.loadAllMetadataClasses even if there is no acl on the method yet. Let's test that it works for a regular user.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: I imagine that READ permission would be enough in this case.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Seems like WRITE permission is required for the testing method to work. I'm not pretty sure how it passes right now but it should be investigated.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Wrong permissions again. How does this test pass?
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: This test class should be removed. But before we can do that we should either ensure that all tests in the class are covered by some tests in other classes or move them from the deleting class to some other classes.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: This method should have suffix ForAdmin, don't you think?
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Let's add the similar test to check if an admin is able to perform the operation for pipeline user metadata.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Seems like mockUser would be quite enough for this helper method.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.message:

Issue #1404: Tests added, names of some tests have been changed

Signed-off-by: Iurii_Kofanov <youkofan@gmail.com>

Issue #1404: Branch rebased, merge conflicts resolved

Issue #1404: Branch rebased, merge conflicts resolved
